name: test-automation-serverest
description: Projeto de automacao de testes de Backend e Frontend usando Cucumber + JavaScript + Playwright

scripts.test:api:report: cucumber-js --tags @api && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:all: npm run clean:reports && cucumber-js --tags "@api or @ui" && npm run report:generate
scripts.test:all:open: npm run test:all && npm run report:open
scripts.report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.clean:reports: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['allure-results', 'allure-report', 'reports', 'test-results'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch(e) {} });"
